  • Uses of Weapon in game

    Classes in game that implement Weapon 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  CraftableWeaponItem
    A base class for weapons that are craftable.
    class  Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    class  ZombieArm
    ZombieArm CraftableWeaponItem will be created when the Zombie's Arm is knocked off.Player can use it to craft a Zombie Club, as it is a subclass of CraftableWeaponItem.
    class  ZombieClub
    Zombie Club is a weapon, can be crafted by using Zombie Arm.
    class  ZombieIntrinsicWeapon
    Class that represents a weapon for an unarmed Zombie
    class  ZombieLeg
    ZombieLeg CraftableWeaponItem will be created when the Zombie's Leg is knocked off.Player can use it to craft a Zombie Mace, as it is a subclass of CraftableWeaponItem.
    class  ZombieMace
    Zombie Mace is a weapon that can be crafted by using Zombie Leg.
    Methods in game that return Weapon 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Weapon Zombie.getWeapon​(GameMap map)
    Overloading method for getWeapon.
